---
name: Feature request
about: Suggest an improvement or new feature
title: "[FEATURE] "
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

**Summary**
One-line summary of the requested feature.

**Problem / Why**
Why is this needed? What user problem does it solve? Provide context and motivating examples.

**Proposal**
A clear description of the proposed change, scope, and acceptance criteria.

**Alternatives considered**
List other options you evaluated and why they were rejected.

**Impact**
Which areas of the system are affected? Estimate effort (S/M/L) and risks.

**Notes**
Screenshots, mockups, or links to related issues/PRs.
